medkit.description: A medkit, it will heal your injuries and restore your health.

bandages.description: You can use these to gain a little health.

picLovedOne.pickup: A picture of you and your family. It means a lot to you.
picLovedOne.description: You keep the memory of your family and your home with you.

phone.description: You can use this to call someone or use the flashlight.

apple.pickup: You look in the refrigerator and find an apple
apple.description: Eat it and it will restore some of your health.

sandwich.description: Eat it and it will restore half your health.

talkie.pickup: You hear a static sound coming from it.
talkie.description: This item will give you hint on your journey

childToy.pickup: You look behind the couch and find a toy from your childhood. It means a lot to you.
childToy.description: It reminds you of a better time.

jewelryImportant.pickup: It's a necklace, it belonged to someone you love. It means a lot to you.
jewelryImportant.description: It reminds you of the time you had with the person most important to you.

earringsGrandma.pickup: It's a pair of earrings, it belonged to your late grandmother. It means a lot to you.
earringsGrandma.description: It reminds you of the time you had with a person you loved.

pet.pickup: It's your pet! It's your best friend in the whole world and a very good boy!

daughter.pickup: Your daughter. She means the world to you!

daughterBoyfriend.pickup: Your daughters boyfriend. You don't particullary care for him.
daughterBoyfriend.description: It's your daughter's boyfriend, you don't think he's all that great.

book.pickup: You search the bookcase and find your favorite book. You've read it a thousand times and still can't get enough of it. It means a lot to you.

coat.pickup: It's a coat. It will protect you from the cold or the rain
coat.description: It's a coat, it keeps you warm.

ductTape.pickup: It's a roll of ducttape. You can use it to bind things together. It may be usefull later on.
ductTape.description: It's a roll of ducttape. You can use it to bind things together.

gasmask.pickup: It's a gasmask. It will protect you from harmfull gasses. It may be usefull later on.
gasmask.description: It's a gasmask. It will protect you from harmfull gasses.

crowbar.pickup: It's a crowbar. Very usefull for breaking open doors. It may be usefull later on.
crowbar.description: It's a crowbar. It can break open certain doors.

knife.pickup: It's a dangerous looking knife. Maybe you can use this to scare of enemies or defend yourself

paperCutout.pickup: It seems to be a cutout article from a newspaper. The article seems to be about a disappeared woman.
paperCutout.description: It seems to be a cutout article from a newspaper.

slimjim.pickup: It's a slimjim. You can use this to 'open' a cardoor.
slimjim.description: A slimjim. Use it to 'open' a cardoor.

bagpack.pickup: It's your bagpack. It can hold everything you need to take with me.

handcuffs.pickup: These are police-issued handcuffs. They don't break easily. They may be usefull later on.

flashlight.pickup: A simple, yet sturdy flashlight. It can light up dark areas. Runs on batteries.

souvenir.pickup: It's a cheap, ugly souvenir from the airport. Yet it also reminds you of home.

stolenRing.pickup: It's a gold ring. It appears to be stolen

gun.pickup: You search the closet and find your handgun.
gun.description: A handgun. This will protect you.

lockpicks.pickup: You search the closet and find a set of lockpicks. These will help you unlock doors.

policePic.pickup: You search the closet and find a piece of police evidence.
